seekers._comment: If any of these seekers are present, alter the X label accordingly

config._comment: If any of these variables are present in the config, alter the X label accordingly

mapping.sMetaRandom: Generic Human (Unvaccinated, undetermined age and health information

behaviour._comment: modelling human conditions providing probabilities they will use better search strategies

baseline._comment_1: Allows for payoff to be contextualised by real data
baseline._comment_2: The environment (hider) in which the baseline data is taken
baseline._comment_3: Invert if higher baseline data is worse, so better payoff should decrease

sRandomWalkLowVaccine._comment_1: Non-winter month health utilisation by low SEC with asthma
sRandomWalkLowVaccine._comment_2: Payoff received when simulating the same environment (non-winter) for the same individuals (low SEC with asthma)
